Original:
22:15在UberEat下訂單，一路等到00:05才拿到餐點(外送路程僅需5分鐘)，一份餐點等了將近2小時！？
期間看到2位UberEat外送員從他處騎車到店家領餐，卻因餐廳延誤而取消，最後第3位外送員則在餐廳等了最少10分鐘才領到餐...當3位外送員北七就對了！？
接著我打電話過去詢問，店家回覆說爆單，但發現爆單不會先暫停點餐系統消化手上訂單嗎？為了多賺錢而讓不知情的顧客繼續下單，當顧客不用睡覺就對了？
謝謝！領教了！從此拉黑！
EN:
22:15 Orders under ubereat, wait until 00:05 to get meals (only 5 minutes for delivery), and wait for nearly 2 hours a meal!Intersection
During this period, I saw 2 Ubereat driving officers riding from him to the store to receive meals, but they were canceled due to the delay of the restaurant. In the end, the third officer waited at the restaurant for at least 10 minutes before receiving the meal ... Dang 3 as 3 Putting on the seventh, Beiqi is right!Intersection
Then I called and asked about it. The store responded to the explosive order, but I found that the explosion order would not suspend the ordering system to digest the order?To make more money, let the unwavering customers continue to place an order. When the customer does not need to sleep?
Thanks!Leaded!From then on, black!
